title: 4 XL Camera Not Working - Google Support Very Slow
content:
My Pixel 4 XL camera stopped working suddenly 11 days ago. I was using it one minute then tried again and the camera app would no longer open (same for the torch).

I went through all the factory reset/safe mode stuff with Google Support but it did not help.

11 days later I still have the case open with Google Support, but not been given any further advice or a RMA. I just keep getting told it has been escalated to a "dedicated team".

What can be done to speed things up here?
